definition: black box/fig. system whose internal structure is unknown
abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]

sentences.english: Examine both black-box and white-box views for each level of abstraction addressed.
sentences.chinese: 爲所描述的每個抽象層分析黑盒及白盒視圖。

sentences.english: Black boxes make it tough to reverse-engineer the equipment.
sentences.chinese: “黑盒子”手法使得中方難以對設備進行反向開發。

sentences.english: These elements are treated as black boxes at that level of decomposition.
sentences.chinese: 這些元素在那個分解層級上被當作黑盒來處理。

sentences.english: Back after black box, ray big mother.
sentences.chinese: 奪回黑盒子之後，雷母大喜。

sentences.english: Erich Gamma : We call this black box reuse.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以把這稱作是“黑盒重用”。

sentences.english: Non-engineers often don't understand software development, and view it as a black-box art.
sentences.chinese: 非技術人員通常不懂軟件開發，視它爲黑盒技術。

sentences.english: It is self-contained and is a "black box" to its consumers.
sentences.chinese: 它是自包含的，對使用者而言它是一個“黑盒子”。

sentences.english: For the vast majority of people, nuclear power is a black box technology.
sentences.chinese: 對於大多數人來說，核電站是一項黑盒子技術。

sentences.english: In Black-Box, the application is a sealed single entity.
sentences.chinese: 在黑盒中，這個應用程序是一個封閉的單獨實體。

sentences.english: The military staff carries the black box.
LeiZiFeng carry black box code case come in.
sentences.chinese: 雷子楓提着黑盒密碼箱進來。

sentences.english: Both load and performance tests come under black box testing.
sentences.chinese: 負載和性能測試都來自於黑盒測試。

sentences.english: A digital multi-meter measures the output voltage of the black box.
sentences.chinese: 數字萬用表測量黑盒的輸出電壓。

sentences.english: Components are black box services that you connect to form your application.
sentences.chinese: 組件是連接起來並形成應用程序的黑盒服務。

sentences.english: The container is something of a magical black box.
sentences.chinese: 容器有點類似於有魔力的黑盒。

sentences.english: Sparks were emitted from small black boxes and red lamps flashed onoff angrily.
sentences.chinese: 小黑盒子裏迸出火花，紅色燈泡發怒似地忽明忽暗。

definition: main engine/(military) lead aircraft/(computing) host computer/main processor/server
Micro-Star International (MSI), Taiwanese computer hardware company
to encapsulate/to enclose/to wrap/to seal inside
